outline:
1. to seek, require, desire, exact, request
    1. (Piel)
      1. to seek to find
      2. to seek to secure
      3. to seek the face
      4. to desire, demand
      5. to require, exact
      6. to ask, request
    2. (Pual) to be sought
kjv_def: ask, beg, beseech, desire, enquire, get, make inquisition, procure, (make) request, require, seek (for).
strongs_def: to search out (by any method, specifically in worship or prayer); by implication, to strive after
